properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Atma praana dehamu thalampulu kriyalu Anniyu nee korake gaikonumu oh Yesuvaa Jeevinchagorithi nee korake Neeke mahima ghanatha{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Veliginchu naa jeevamu nimpumu nee prematho nee Krupatho nadichedanu mendaina nee shakthithoghana Paracha gorithini nee naamamunu Neeke mahima ghanatha{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa kaallu chetulella nee seva karpinthunu Naa naaluka nityamu ninnu stutimpa nimmu Manasaara preminthu ninu prabhuvaa Neeke mahima ghanatha{/lang-eng}
